mapper.sql: ID, ONLINE_SPEC_ID, ONLINE_ID, USER_ID, CART_COUNT, JOIN_TIME
mapper.insert:
insert into ONL_CART
ID,
ONLINE_SPEC_ID,
ONLINE_ID,
USER_ID,
CART_COUNT,
JOIN_TIME,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{onlineSpecId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{onlineId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{cartCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{joinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update ONL_CART
ONLINE_SPEC_ID = #{onlineSpecId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ONLINE_ID = #{onlineId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CART_COUNT = #{cartCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
JOIN_TIME = #{joinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ONL_CART set ONLINE_SPEC_ID = #{onlineSpecId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ONLINE_ID = #{onlineId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CART_COUNT = #{cartCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, JOIN_TIME = #{joinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ID, ONLINE_SPEC_ID, ONLINE_ID, USER_ID, CART_COUNT, JOIN_TIME from ONL_CART
mapper.delete: delete from ONL_CART WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
delete from ONL_CART WHERE ID IN (${ids}) AND USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ONL_CART WHERE USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT oc.ID, oc.ONLINE_ID, oo.ONLINE_TITLE,oo.SUBJECT_TYPE,oo.PRODUCT_ID, oc.ONLINE_SPEC_ID, oo.PRODUCT_ID, oos.ONLINE_SPEC, oos.SALE_PRICE, oos.CASHBACK_AMOUNT, oc.CART_COUNT, oop.PIC_PATH FROM ONL_CART oc LEFT JOIN ONL_ONLINE oo ON oc.ONLINE_ID=oo.ID LEFT JOIN ONL_ONLINE_SPEC oos ON oc.ONLINE_SPEC_ID=oos.ID LEFT JOIN ONL_ONLINE_PIC oop ON oc.ONLINE_ID=oop.ONLINE_ID AND oop.PIC_TYPE=1 WHERE oc.USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY oc.JOIN_TIME ASC
